item.title: Mixing TFVC and Git
item.description: It all started because I needed using files coming from a Git repository and additional files stored in classic Team Foundation Version Control (TFVC), all toghether in the same build. The Options You have three options: the REST API, the tf.exe vc command or … we will see. Option 1 â€“ REST API My first attempt relied on a Powershell script to download the files from TFVC using REST API. It worked but performance is not that great as you have to download a file at a time in a loop.
